name: Color Jump - Endless Fun!
description:
How fast can you jump?

This is the different type challenge and fun game!
Just tap the screen to jump between orbits, don’t hit red color, get all other colors for more points and additional powers. Very easy to play but hard to reach high!

We hope you are having fun playing Color Jump :)

Features:
- 100 levels only
- Free to play
- Endless gameplay
- Different levels
- Simple one finger control, just tab the screen :)
- Challenge your friends with the best high score
- Suitable for all ages
- Play it anywhere, anytime

Do you want extra features for the game?
Don't be shy, write review for feedback.
